chart_description: This chart shows the CPU usage of different user groups on the system, where 100% equals one core. The stacked design allows for easy comparison between groups.

dimension_descriptions.1000: CPU usage of user with UID 1000.
dimension_descriptions.65532: CPU usage of user with UID 65532.
dimension_descriptions.81: CPU usage of user with UID 81.
dimension_descriptions._chrony: CPU usage of the Chrony NTP daemon.
dimension_descriptions.libvirt: CPU usage of the libvirt virtual machine management service.
dimension_descriptions.messagebus: CPU usage of the D-Bus message bus.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: CPU usage of the Netdata monitoring daemon.
dimension_descriptions.nobody: CPU usage of the nobody user.
dimension_descriptions.root: CPU usage of the root user.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: CPU usage of the systemd-coredump crash handling process.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: CPU usage of the XFS filesystem.
